Description.Text: Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan/Times Square features 244 rooms and suites in the heart of New York City. This Midtown Manhattan hotel, located at the crossroads of the world, features affordable prices and is perfect for family vacations, business travelers, and small group meetings. spacious guest rooms with free internet. Work out in state-of-the-art fitness room and enjoy free breakfast including Starbucks Coffee before exploring some of the nearby Midtown attractions such as the Broadway theaters, Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue and Central Park. This hotel is centrally located in Times Square, across from Port Authority Bus Terminal, minutes from Penn Station and within walking distance of the Jacob Javits Convention Cen
• Jacob Javits Conv. Center • Madison Square Garden • Empire State Building

• Marriott's Fairfield Inn New York Manhattan Times Square hotel has 244 guest rooms & suites in NYC • NY Fairfield Inn by Marriott revitalizing sleep experience with plush mattress and crisp linens • Spacious Times Square hotel guest rooms with well-lit work areas and free high-speed internet • 32" flat-screen HDTV, two phones and data ports, complimentary Starbucks Coffee in all guest rooms • Feel at home at this Fairfield Inn NY with hair dryers, irons and ironing boards in every room • This hotel in Midtown Manhattan also offers guest room refrigerators available upon advance request • This hotel has a smoke-free policy

• Newly built, boutique-style Times Square hotel centrally located in Midtown Manhattan New York • Affordably priced New York City hotel featuring free breakfast including Starbucks Coffee and free high-speed internet access • Flat-screen TV's, in-room safes, free Starbucks Coffee & free newspaper at this Fairfield Inn by Marriott NY
Check-in: 3:00 pm Check-out: 12:00 pm Express check-out Pet Policy: Pets not allowed

From La Guardia - LG: Turn right on to Grand Central Pkwy Take exit 4 for Brooklyn Queens Expy Merge onto E Brooklyn Queens Expy/ Queens Midtown Expy Take Exit 35 to merge onto I-495 W Exit onto Tunnel Exit St Turn right onto E 34th St. Turn right onto 10th Ave Turn right onto W. 40th St. The hotel will be on your right!
From JF Kennedy - JFK : Take Van Wyck Expwy to Grand Central Pkwy to Long Island Expwy westbound to the Midtown Tunnel. Continue west to Eighth Ave. Turn right on Eighth Ave. to 40th St.

On-site: SKY ROOM - Sky Room is the Roof Top Lounge. The highest roof top lounge in NYC with 360 views of the City Skyline
